testtool.model.database

Class QuestionDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • testtool.model.database.QuestionDB

  • public class QuestionDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Class QuestionDB provides a front-end for the database of raw question data. It provides method to add, remove, and modify the question data within the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      QuestionDB()

      Adds a new entry to the Question table using the passed data.

      void removeQuestion(int qid)
      Removes entry from Question table with the passed question id.

      Builds a Question object from the data of the question in the database with a matching question id.

    • Method Detail

      • addQuestion

        public void addQuestion(QuestionType type,
                        Course course,
                        java.lang.String prompt,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Answer> answers,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                        QuestionDifficulty difficulty,
                        int time,
                        User createdBy,
                        java.util.Date createdOn)
        Adds a new entry to the Question table using the passed data.
        Parameters:
        type - question type; determines answer(s) interpretation
        course - subject question was created for
        prompt - question prompt/instructions
        answers - possible responses to the question
        keywords - keywords associated with the question (for search)
        difficulty - difficulty rating for the question
        time - estimated time to complete the question
        createdBy - user that created the question
        createdOn - date that the question was created

      • alterQuestion

        public void alterQuestion()
        Alters entry on Question table using data from arguments.

      • removeQuestion

        public void removeQuestion(int qid)
        Removes entry from Question table with the passed question id.
        Parameters:
        qid - question id of the Question table entry to be removed 
               pre:
        //
        // A question with the passed question id exists in the database.
        //
        selectQuestion(qid) != null;

       post:
        //
        // The question with the passed question id has been removed.
        //
        selectQuestion(qid) == null;

      • selectQuestions

        public java.util.Collection<Question> selectQuestions(Question attributes)
        Builds a Question object from the data of the question in the database with a matching question id. param qid question id corresponding to an entry in the question table return object representation of data corresponding to table entry 
               pre:
        //
        // A question with the passed question id exists in the database.
        //
        selectQuestion(qid) != null;

       post:
        //
        // The Question object was built from data in the question table entry
        //   with the same question id.
        //
        return.qid == qid;
        / public Question selectQuestion(int qid) { return null; } /** Builds a collection of Question objects from the data of any number of questions in the database with attributes matching those of the argument.
